description: Parties that have ratified/acceded the Convention on the Conservation of Migratory Species of Wild Animals (CMS), in the Americas as of 1 November 2019. The Convention was adopted in Bonn on 23 June 1979 and was entered into force on 1 November 1983, the first day of the third month following the date of deposit of the fifteenth instrument of ratification, acceptance, approval or accession with the Depositary.
name: CLME: Convention on Migratory Species (CMS) Ratification Status
